hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: I once glued a set of false teeth to the Boomerang.^${12 39 c7}That came back to bite me.
